System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializer("System.Windows.Forms.Design.TableLayoutPanelCodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 表示一个面板，它可以在一个由行和列组成的网格中对其内容进行动态布局。

span.span: Represents a panel that dynamically lays out its contents in a grid composed of rows and columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将其内容排列在网格中。The control arranges its contents in a grid. 由于布局是同时在设计时和运行时执行的，因此它可随应用程序环境的变化而动态地变化。Because the layout is performed both at design time and run time, it can change dynamically as the application environment changes. 这使得面板中的控件能够按比例调整大小，以便能够响应更改（例如父控件的大小调整或本地化产生的文本长度更改）。This gives the controls in the panel the ability to proportionally resize, so it can respond to changes such as the parent control resizing or text length changing due to localization. 任何 Windows 窗体控件均可以是 控制的子控件，包括 的其他实例。Any Windows Forms control can be a child of the control, including other instances of . 这使您可以构建适应运行时更改的复杂布局。This allows you to construct sophisticated layouts that adapt to changes at runtime. 添加新控件时， 控件可扩展以容纳新控件，具体取决于 、 和 属性的值。The control can expand to accommodate new controls when they are added, depending on the value of the , , and properties. 将 或 属性的值设置为 0 指定将取消 在相应方向的绑定。Setting either the or property to a value of 0 specifies that the will be unbound in the corresponding direction. 在 控件充满子控件后，还可控制扩展的方向（水平或垂直）。You can also control the direction of expansion (horizontal or vertical) after the control is full of child controls. 默认情况下， 控件通过添加行向下扩展。By default, the control expands downward by adding rows. 如果需要使行和列的行为不同于默认行为，可以通过使用 和 属性来控制行和列的属性。If you want rows and columns that behave differently from the default behavior, you can control the properties of rows and columns by using the and properties. 可分别设置行或列的属性。You can set the properties of rows or columns individually. 控件将以下属性添加到其子控件中：`Cell`、`Column`、`Row`、`ColumnSpan` 和 `RowSpan`。The control adds the following properties to its child controls: `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan`. 可以通过设置子控件上的 `ColumnSpan` 或 `RowSpan` 属性来合并 控件中的单元格。You can merge cells in the control by setting the `ColumnSpan` or `RowSpan` properties on a child control. > [!NOTE] > 若要在运行时设置 `Cell`、`Column`、`Row`、`ColumnSpan`和 `RowSpan` 属性，请使用 、、、和 方法。To set the `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan` properties at run time, use the , , , , and methods. > > 若要在运行时读取 `Cell`、`Column`、`Row`、`ColumnSpan`和 `RowSpan` 属性，请使用 、、、和 方法。To read the `Cell`, `Column`, `Row`, `ColumnSpan`, and `RowSpan` properties at run time, use the , , , , and methods. 子控件的停靠行为与其他容器控件的行为相同。The docking behavior of child controls is the same as other container controls. 中的子控件的定位行为与其他容器控件中的行为不同。The anchoring behavior of child controls in a differs from the behavior in other container controls. 如果子控件的 属性的值设置为 或 ，则该控件将被放置在该单元格的左边框或右边框上，距离是控件 属性和面板的 属性之和。If the value of the child control's property is set to or , the control will be placed against the left or right border of the cell, at a distance that is the sum of the control's property and the panel's property. 如果同时设置了 值和 值，则会将控件的宽度调整到单元格的宽度，并考虑 和 值。If both the and values are set, the control will be sized to the width of the cell, with the and values taken into account. 和 定位的行为类似。The behavior for and anchoring is analogous. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 TableLayoutPanel 控件中锚定和停靠子控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-anchor-and-dock-child-controls-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control)。For more information, see [How to: Anchor and Dock Child Controls in a TableLayoutPanel Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-anchor-and-dock-child-controls-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control). 如果需要子控件来模拟其他容器控件中的默认定位行为，则可以调整 和 属性，使控件边框与单元格边框之间保持恒定距离。If you need a child control to mimic the default anchoring behavior in other container controls, you can adjust the and properties to maintain a constant distance between the control's border and the cell's border. 如果将子控件的 "`Column`" 和 "`Row`" 属性的值设置为-1，则会将该控件移到 控件中的第一个空单元。Setting the values of both the `Column` and `Row` properties of a child control to -1 will cause the control to be moved to the first empty cell in the control. 在从左到右和从上到下的搜索中，将选择空单元格。The empty cell will be chosen in a search that proceeds from left to right and from top to bottom. 此顺序依赖于区域性，因此它在从右向左（RTL）布局中的行为正确。This order is dependent on the culture, so it will behave correctly in right-to-left (RTL) layouts. > [!NOTE] > 仅 属性设置为 `true` 的控件参与 控件的布局计算。Only controls that have the property set to `true` participate in the control's layout computations. 另请参阅：Also see: - [如何：在 TableLayoutPanel 控件中对齐和拉伸控件How to: Align and Stretch a Control in a TableLayoutPanel Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-align-and-stretch-a-control-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control) - [如何：在 TableLayoutPanel 控件中跨行和跨列How to: Span Rows and Columns in a TableLayoutPanel Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-span-rows-and-columns-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control) - [如何：在 TableLayoutPanel 控件中编辑行和列How to: Edit Columns and Rows in a TableLayoutPanel Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-edit-columns-and-rows-in-a-tablelayoutpanel-control) - [演练：使用 TableLayoutPanel 在 Windows 窗体上排列控件Walkthrough: Arranging Controls on Windows Forms Using a TableLayoutPanel](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-arranging-controls-on-windows-forms-using-a-tablelayoutpanel) ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法，以创建单元格的自定义外观。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to create a custom appearance for a cell. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#100)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此值将导致面板重绘其自身及其内容。Setting this value will cause the panel to redraw itself and its contents. ## Examples 下面的代码示例根据所选 设置 属性的值。The following code example sets the value of the property depending on the selected . remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告 事件的发生。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为 `TableLayoutPanel1` 类型实例的项目中。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TableLayoutPanel1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与 事件关联。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#561](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#561)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#561](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#561)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ColumnCount { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ColumnCount : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置表中列的数目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of columns in the table.
The number of columns in the control.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以为具有已知和固定数量单元格的布局同时指定 和 属性。You can specify both the and the properties for layouts with a known and fixed number of cells. 如果希望布局中的单元格数增长，还可以指定一个属性或另一个属性，前提是 属性允许此类增长。You can also specify one property or the other if you expect the number of cells in your layout to grow, assuming that the property allows for such growth. 如果 的值为0，则面板将通过添加行增加，如果 的值为0，则面板将通过添加列来增长。If the value of is 0, the panel will grow by adding rows, and if the value of is 0, the panel will grow by adding columns. 不过，将 或 设置为0时，指定面板的增长是 属性的首选。Specifying panel growth with the property is preferred to setting or to 0, however. 可以使用 属性在表中添加或删除控件。Controls can be added or deleted from the table using the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnStyles As TableLayoutColumnStyleCollection

summary.span: 获取 的列样式的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of column styles for the .

value.span: 包含 控件中每个列的 的 。

span.span: A containing a for each column in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性访问特定列的样式属性。Use the property to access the style properties of specific columns. 您可以使用 类的成员设置表中各列的特征。You can use members of the class to set the characteristics of individual columns in the table. 在 控件排列其列时，会按以下顺序将优先级分配给每个 ：When the control arranges its columns, it assigns priorities to each in the following order: 1. 将 设置为 的列首先被视为，并分配其固定宽度。Columns with set to are considered first, and their fixed widths are allocated. 2. 将 设置为 的列将调整为其内容大小。Columns with set to are sized to their contents. 3. 剩余空间在列之间划分， 设置为 。Remaining space is divided among columns with set to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例在单击 时设置每个列的 属性。The following code example sets the properties of each column when a is clicked. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#8)]

summary.span: 返回指定子控件的列位置。

span.span: Returns the column position of the specified child control.

returns.span: 指定子控件的列位置，或者如果 的位置由 决定，则为 -1。

span.span: The column position of the specified child control, or -1 if the position of is determined by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `control` 跨两列或更多列，则 方法将返回最低的列索引。If `control` spans two or more columns, the method will return the lowest column index. 列位置值是从零开始的，因此你可以将其用作 返回的数组的索引。The column position value is zero based, so you can use it as an index for the array returned by . 此方法由 `Column` 属性调用，面板将在设计时将其添加到其子控件。This method is called by the `Column` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time. 若要获取 `control`的实际位置（即使其位置由 确定），请调用 方法。To get the actual position of `control`, even when its position is determined by , call the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例枚举 中的所有子控件，并使用 方法查找每个控件的列索引。The following code example enumerates all the child controls in the and finds the column index for each control using the method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 返回指定子控件跨的列数。

span.span: Returns the number of columns spanned by the specified child control.
The number of columns spanned by the child control.
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列跨距对于定位比其对等端大得多的控件通常非常有用。Column spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably wider than its peers. 此方法由 `ColumnSpan` 属性调用，面板将在设计时将其添加到其子控件。This method is called by the `ColumnSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 和 方法在 中设置 控件的宽度。The following code example uses the and methods to set the width of a control in a . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#11)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回 `control`的实际当前位置，即使其位置由 确定。The method returns the actual current position of `control`, even if its position is determined by the . 此方法将考虑整个 控件的状态，包括列或行跨越以及当 放置控件的 `Column` 并 `Row` 属性设置为-1 时。This method takes into account the entire control state, including column or row spanning and when the has placed a control with its `Column` and `Row` properties set to -1. 这等效于 和 返回-1 的情况。This is equivalent to the situation in which and return -1.

span.span: The row position of , or -1 if the position of is determined by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `control` 跨两行或更多行， 方法将返回最低的行索引。If `control` spans two or more rows, the method will return the lowest row index. 行位置值是从零开始的，因此你可以将其用作 返回的数组的索引。The row position value is zero based, so you can use it as an index for the array returned by . 此方法由 `Row` 属性调用，面板将在设计时将其添加到其子控件。This method is called by the `Row` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time. 若要获取 `control`的实际位置（即使其位置由 确定），请调用 方法。To get the actual position of `control`, even when its position is determined by , call the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例枚举 中的所有子控件，并使用 方法查找每个子控件的行索引。The following code example enumerates all the child controls in the and finds the row index for each using the method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行跨距对于定位比其对等端大得多的控件通常非常有用。Row spanning is often useful for positioning a control that is considerably taller than its peers. 此方法由 `RowSpan` 属性调用，面板将在设计时将其添加到其子控件。This method is called by the `RowSpan` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 和 方法在 中设置 控件的宽度。The following code example uses the and methods to set the width of a control in a . MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle GrowStyle { System::Windows::Forms::TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当现有的所有单元格都被占用时， 控件是否应该扩展以容纳新单元格。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should expand to accommodate new cells when all existing cells are occupied.
A indicating the growth scheme.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 控件通过添加行向下扩展。By default, the control expands downward by adding rows. > [!NOTE] > 如果尝试将控件添加到完全 的控件，并且 的值 ，则将引发 。If an attempt is made to add a control to a full control, and the value of is , then an is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例根据所选 设置 属性的值。The following code example sets the value of the property depending on the selected . 在运行时，当用户单击标记为 "**测试 GrowStyle**" 的按钮时， 控件将添加到 控件中。At run time, when the user clicks on the button labeled **Test GrowStyle**, a control is added to the control. 如果 控件已满，则会通过添加行或列进行扩展，或根据 的值引发异常。If the control is full, it expands by adding a row or column, or it raises an exception, depending on the value of . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#7)]

summary.span: 获取或设置表中行的数目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows in the table.
The number of rows in the control.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以为具有已知和固定数量单元格的布局同时指定 和 属性。You can specify both the and the properties for layouts with a known and fixed number of cells. 如果希望布局中的单元格数增长，还可以指定一个属性或另一个属性，前提是 属性允许此类增长。You can also specify one property or the other if you expect the number of cells in your layout to grow, assuming that the property allows for such growth. 如果 的值为0，则面板将通过添加行增加，如果 的值为0，则面板将通过添加列来增长。If the value of is 0, the panel will grow by adding rows, and if the value of is 0, the panel will grow by adding columns. 不过，将 或 设置为0时，指定面板的增长是 属性的首选。Specifying panel growth with the property is preferred to setting or to 0, however. 可以使用 属性在表中添加或删除控件。Controls can be added or deleted from the table using the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RowStyles As TableLayoutRowStyleCollection

summary.span: 获取 的行样式的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of row styles for the .

value.span: 包含 控件中每行的 的 。

span.span: A containing a for each row in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性访问特定行的样式属性。Use the property to access the style properties of specific rows. 您可以使用 类的成员设置表中各个行的特征。You can use members of the class to set the characteristics of individual rows in the table. 在 控件排列其行时，它会按以下顺序将优先级分配给每个 ：When the control arranges its rows, it assigns priorities to each in the following order: 1. 将 设置为 的行将首先被视为，并分配其固定高度。Rows with set to are considered first, and their fixed heights are allocated. 2. 将 设置为 的行将调整为其内容大小。Rows with set to are sized to their contents. 3. 剩余空间在 设置为 的行间划分。Remaining space is divided among rows with set to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例在单击 时设置每行的 属性。The following code example sets the properties of each row when a is clicked. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#9)]

span.span: The control to move to another column.
The column to which will be moved.

summary.span: 设置指定子控件的列位置。

span.span: Sets the column position of the specified child control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将控件移动到 中的其他列。The method moves the control to another column in the . 列和行具有从零开始的索引。The columns and rows have zero-based indexes. 将列位置设置为-1 指定控件将流向第一个空单元。Setting the column position to -1 specifies that the control will flow to the first empty cell. 此方法会将表布局重新应用于 中的所有控件。This method reapplies the table layout to all controls in the . 此方法由 `Column` 属性调用，面板将在设计时将其添加到其子控件。This method is called by the `Column` property, which the panel adds to its child controls at design time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法来交换 控件中包含的两个控件。The following code example uses the method to swap two controls contained within a control. 该示例假定 控件至少包含两行。The example assumes a control with at least two rows. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/CS/form1.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel/VB/form1.vb#12)]
